actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to executory contracts and unexpired leases, and for other purposes.
short_title: Non-Monetary Default and Unexpired Lease in Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1996

summary.text: Non-Monetary Default and Unexpired Lease in Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1996 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to declare that the trustee in bankruptcy may assume a debtor's executory contract or an unexpired lease of personal property without satisfying any penalty rate or penalty provision relating to a default arising from the debtor's failure to perform nonmonetary obligations under the contract or lease.

titles.title: Non-Monetary Default and Unexpired Lease in Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1996
A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, with respect to executory contracts and unexpired leases, and for other purposes.
